channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Detroit-area city can ban LGBTQ+ pride flags on public property, judge says
item.description: A Detroit-area city that banned LGBTQ+ flags from publicly owned flagpoles did not violate the Constitution, a judge said.

item.title: Congressional Black Caucus members rip GOP's 'racist' redistricting plans
item.description: Congressional Black Caucus members on Tuesday decried redistricting efforts by Republicans as a "racist" plan that has threatened the seats of CBC law...

item.title: 'Not the typical case': Newsom's attempt to end Trump troop deployment turned away by judge
item.description: A federal judge put a temporary kibosh on California Gov. Gavin Newsom's attempt to shut down President Trump's troop deployment to Los Angeles.

item.title: Court: Lisa Cook can remain Federal Reserve governor while fighting Trump's attempt to fire her
item.description: A federal court ruled Tuesday that embattled Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook can remain in her position while she fights President Donald Trump's e...

item.title: Democrat James Walkinshaw wins U.S. House special election in Virginia
item.description: Democrat James Walkinshaw, a politician with experience working on Capitol Hill, has won a special election to be the next U.S. House representative o...

item.title: Wu Woos Illegal Aliens in Boston
item.description: For Boston Mayor Michelle Wu, protecting illegal aliens takes priority over defending her city against a federal lawsuit, compromising much-needed fed...

item.title: Over 3 Million People Sign Leniency Petition for Illegal Alien Charged with Killing Three Florida Motorists
item.description: Over 3 million people have signed a petition demanding leniency for Harjinder Singh, the illegal alien truck driver accused of causing a horrific cras...

item.title: The Trump Administration Plans to Crack Down on Immigration by Islamist Extremists

item.title: Third Military Buffer Zone Established Along U.S.-Mexico Border in Arizona
item.description: The “Yuma National Defense Area” at the southern border in Arizona allows the military to support the Trump administration’s whole-of-government appro...

item.title: Mass Immigration Lobby Peddling Stale, Obsolete Arguments Few Are Buying
item.description: The pro-mass-migration lobby has been recycling the same time-worn talking points to fool the public into accepting open borders, amnesty, and the mas...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
